outputs.output_descr: Demonstrate best practices in health-care waste management, such as promoting use of alternative waste treatment technologies, improved waste segregation practices and the use of appropriate alternatives to mercury-containing devices. Training will be provided and training programs put in place to ensure the sustainability and replication of Project gains.

project_descr: Demonstrate and Promote Best Techniques and Practices for Reducing Health-Care Waste to avoid Environmental Releases of Dioxins and Mercury
